name: Fair Haven Financial Technologies Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of a shariah-compliant mobile application designed to change the way users buy, save, sell, and redeem physical gold. The company's platform allows users to purchase and store gold online or take physical possession of the gold which can be sold at the prevailing exchange rates, enabling users to take a step toward lifelong financial security.
one_liner: Developer of a shariah-compliant mobile application designed to change the way users buy, save, sell, and redeem physical gold. The company's platform allows users to purchase and store gold online or take physical possession of the gold which can be sold at the prevailing exchange rates, enabling users to take a step toward lifelong financial security.
